item.text: Then all the community raised a loud cry, and the people wept that night.

And <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">murmured</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> and <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>, and the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05712" class="">congregation</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="03863" class="">If only</st> we had <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03863" class="">if only</st> we had <st data-num="04191" class="">perished</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>!
Why has the Lord brought us into this land only to be killed by the sword, that our wives and our children should become plunder? Wouldn’t it be better for us to return to Egypt?”
So they said to one another, “Let’s appoint a leader and return to Egypt.”
Then Moses and Aaron fell down with their faces to the ground before the whole assembled community of the Israelites.

And <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st> and <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st>, two <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> those who had <st data-num="08446" class="">investigated</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="07167" class="">tore</st> their <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st>.

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st> of the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, “The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> we <st data-num="05674" class="">passed through</st> to <st data-num="08446" class="">investigate</st> is an <st data-num="03966 03966">exceedingly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.
If the Lord delights in us, then he will bring us into this land and give it to us—a land that is flowing with milk and honey.
Only do not rebel against the Lord, and do not fear the people of the land, for they are bread for us. Their protection has turned aside from them, but the Lord is with us. Do not fear them!”
However, the whole community threatened to stone them. But the glory of the Lord appeared to all the Israelites at the tent of meeting.
The Lord said to Moses, “How long will this people despise me, and how long will they not believe in me, in spite of the signs that I have done among them?
I will strike them with the pestilence, and I will disinherit them—I will make you into a nation that is greater and mightier than they!”
Moses said to the Lord, “When the Egyptians hear it—for you brought up this people by your power from among them—

then they will tell it to the inhabitants of this land. They have heard that you, Lord, are among this people, that you, Lord, are seen face to face, that your cloud stands over them, and that you go before them by day in a pillar of cloud and in a pillar of fire by night.

If you <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0376 0259">entire</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0376 0259">at once</st>,<n id="2" /> then the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> of your <st data-num="08088" class="">fame</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>,
‘Because the Lord was not able to bring this people into the land that he swore to them, he killed them in the wilderness.’

So <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st>, let the <st data-num="03581" class="">power</st> of my <st data-num="0136" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01431" class="">be great</st>, just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> you have <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st>,

‘The Lord is slow to anger and abounding in loyal love, forgiving iniquity and transgression, but by no means clearing the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children until the third and fourth generations.’
Please forgive the iniquity of this people according to your great loyal love, just as you have forgiven this people from Egypt even until now.”
Then the Lord said, “I have forgiven them as you asked.
But truly, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">people</st> have <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> my <st data-num="03519" class="">glory</st> and my <st data-num="0226" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> and in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>, and yet have <st data-num="05254" class="">tempted</st><n id="1" /> me now <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">times</st>,<n id="2" /> and have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">obeyed</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">me</st><n id="3" />—

they will <st data-num="0518" class="">by no means</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="07650" class="">promised on oath</st> to their <st data-num="01" class="">fathers</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> will <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of them who <st data-num="05006" class="">despised</st> me <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> it—

Only my <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st>, <st data-num="06118" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="01961 05973">had</st> a <st data-num="0312" class="">different</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st> and has <st data-num="0310" class="">followed</st> me <st data-num="04390" class="">fully</st>—I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> he had <st data-num="0935" class="">gone</st>, and his <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="03423" class="">possess</st> it.
(Now the Amalekites and the Canaanites were living in the valleys.) Tomorrow, turn and journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red Sea.”
The Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“<st data-num="05704 04970">How long</st> must I bear<n id="1" /> with <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="05712" class="">congregation</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">murmurs</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> me? I have <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="08519" class="">complaints</st> of the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">murmured</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> me.
Say to them, ‘As I live, says the Lord, I will surely do to you just what you have spoken in my hearing.

Your <st data-num="06297" class="">dead bodies</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>—<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> those of you who were <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st>, according to your <st data-num="03605" class="">full</st> <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st>, from <st data-num="06242" class="">twenty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="03885" class="">murmured</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> me.

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> will <st data-num="0518" class="">by no means</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="05375 03027">swore</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="07931" class="">settle</st><n id="3" /> you. The <st data-num="0518 03588">only exceptions</st> are <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st> and <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st>.

But I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring in</st> your <st data-num="02945" class="">little ones</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> would <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> <st data-num="0957" class="">victims of war</st>,<n id="1" /> and they will <st data-num="03045" class="">enjoy</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="03988" class="">despised</st>.

But as for <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, your <st data-num="06297" class="">dead bodies</st> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>,

and your <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> will <st data-num="01961 07462">wander</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> and <st data-num="05375" class="">suffer</st> for your <st data-num="02184" class="">unfaithfulness</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> your <st data-num="06297" class="">dead bodies</st> <st data-num="08552" class="">lie finished</st><n id="3" /> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>.

According to the <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> you have <st data-num="08446" class="">investigated</st> this <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>—one <st data-num="03117 03117">day</st> for a <st data-num="08141 08141">year</st>—you will <st data-num="05375" class="">suffer for</st><n id="1" /> your <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquities</st>, <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>, and you will <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="08569" class="">what it means to thwart</st> me.<n id="2" />
I, the Lord, have said, “I will surely do so to all this evil congregation that has gathered together against me. In this wilderness they will be finished, and there they will die!”’”
The men whom Moses sent to investigate the land, who returned and made the whole community murmur against him by producing an evil report about the land,
those men who produced the evil report about the land, died by the plague before the Lord.

But <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st> and <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st>, who were <st data-num="04480" class="">among</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> who <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="08446" class="">investigate</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="02421" class="">lived</st>.
When Moses told these things to all the Israelites, the people mourned greatly.
And early in the morning they went up to the crest of the hill country, saying, “Here we are, and we will go up to the place that the Lord commanded, for we have sinned.”
But Moses said, “Why are you now transgressing the commandment of the Lord? It will not succeed!
Do not go up, for the Lord is not among you, and you will be defeated before your enemies.
For the Amalekites and the Canaanites are there before you, and you will fall by the sword. Because you have turned away from the Lord, the Lord will not be with you.”
But they dared to go up to the crest of the hill, although neither the ark of the covenant of the Lord nor Moses departed from the camp.
So the Amalekites and the Canaanites who lived in that hill country swooped down and attacked them as far as Hormah.
